verses.verse: לְדָוִ֡ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid [A Psalm] of David אֵ֘לֶ֤יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha to יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אֶקְרָ֗א <WH7121> 'ek-Ra, Unto thee will I cry צוּרִי֮ <WH6697> tzu-Ri my rock אַֽל־ <WH408> 'al- not תֶּחֱרַ֪שׁ <WH2790> te-che-Rash to me lest [if] thou be silent מִ֫מֶּ֥נִּי <WH4480> mi-Men-ni at פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- do תֶּֽחֱשֶׁ֥ה <WH2790> te-che-Sheh not be deaf מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> mi-Men-ni; at וְ֝נִמְשַׁ֗לְתִּי <WH4911> ve-nim-Shal-ti, to me I become עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- who י֥וֹרְדֵי <WH3381> Yor-dei like them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <WH953> Vor. into the pit

שְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> she-Ma' Hear ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol the voice תַּ֭חֲנוּנַי <WH8469> Ta-cha-nu-nai of my supplications בְּשַׁוְּעִ֣י <WH7768> be-shav-ve-'I when I cry אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha; toward בְּנָשְׂאִ֥י <WH5375> be-na-se-'I unto thee when I lift up יָ֝דַ֗י <WH3027> ya-Dai, my hands אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- toward דְּבִ֥יר <WH1687> de-Vir oracle קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH6944> kod-She-cha toward thy holy

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּמְשְׁכֵ֣נִי <WH4900> tim-she-Che-ni Draw me not away עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with רְשָׁעִים֮ <WH7563> re-sha-'Im with the wicked וְעִם־ <WH5973> ve-'im- who פֹּ֪עֲלֵ֫י <WH6466> po-'a-Lei and with the workers אָ֥וֶן <WH205> 'A-ven of iniquity דֹּבְרֵ֣י <WH1696> doe-Rei which speak שָׁ֭לוֹם <WH7965> lom peace עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with רֵֽעֵיהֶ֑ם <WH7453> re-'ei-Hem; to their neighbours וְ֝רָעָ֗ה <WH7451> ve-ra-'Ah, but mischief בִּלְבָבָֽם׃ <WH3824> bil-va-Vam. [is] in their hearts

תֶּן־ <WH5414> ten- Give לָהֶ֣ם <WH1992> la-Hem according כְּפָעֳלָם֮ <WH6467> ke-fo-'o-Lam them according to their deeds וּכְרֹ֪עַ <WH7455> u-che-Ro-a' and according to the wickedness מַֽעַלְלֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <WH4611> ma-'al-Lei-Hem of their endeavours כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> ke-ma-'a-Seh them after the work יְ֭דֵיהֶם <WH3027> Ye-dei-hem of their hands תֵּ֣ן <WH5414> ten give לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> la-Hem; like הָשֵׁ֖ב <WH7725> ha-Shev render גְּמוּלָ֣ם <WH1576> ge-mu-Lam to them their desert לָהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> la-Hem. like

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki Because לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo Nor יָבִ֡ינוּ <WH995> ya-Vi-nu Because they regard אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about פְּעֻלֹּ֣ת <WH6468> pe-'ul-Lot not the works יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- about מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> ma-'a-Seh nor the operation יָדָ֑יו <WH3027> ya-Dav; of his hands יֶ֝הֶרְסֵ֗ם <WH2040> ye-her-Sem, he shall destroy וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo Nor יִבְנֵֽם׃ <WH1129> yiv-Nem. them and not build them up

בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> ba-Ruch Blessed יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; [be] the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> ki-Sha- Because שָׁ֝מַע <WH8085> ma' because he hath heard ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol the voice תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <WH8469> ta-cha-nu-Nai. of my supplications

יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD עֻזִּ֥י <WH5797> 'uz-Zi [is] my strength וּמָגִנִּי֮ <WH4043> u-ma-gin-Ni and my shield בּ֤וֹ bo בָטַ֥ח <WH982> va-Tach trusted לִבִּ֗י <WH3820> lib-Bi, my heart וְֽנֶ֫עֱזָ֥רְתִּי <WH5826> ve-Ne-'e-Za-re-ti in him and I am helped וַיַּעֲלֹ֥ז <WH5937> vai-ya-'a-Loz greatly rejoiceth לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> lib-Bi; therefore my heart וּֽמִשִּׁירִ֥י <WH7892> u-mish-shi-Ri and with my song אֲהוֹדֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH3034> a-ho-Den-nu. will I praise

יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD עֹֽז־ <WH5797> 'oz- [is] their strength לָ֑מוֹ la-mo; וּמָ֘ע֤וֹז <WH4581> u-Ma-'oz strength יְשׁוּע֖וֹת <WH3444> ye-shu-'ot and he [is] the saving מְשִׁיח֣וֹ <WH4899> me-shi-Cho of his anointed הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. he

הוֹשִׁ֤יעָה׀ <WH3467> ho-Shi-'ah Save אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַמֶּ֗ךָ <WH5971> 'am-Me-cha, thy people וּבָרֵ֥ךְ <WH1288> u-va-Rech and bless אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ <WH5159> na-cha-la-Te-cha; thine inheritance וּֽרְעֵ֥ם <WH7462> u-re-'Em feed וְ֝נַשְּׂאֵ֗ם <WH5375> ve-nas-se-'Em, them also and lift them up עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- for הָעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ha-'o-Lam. for ever
